author: Warhammer
description:
Watch along as Adam answers your questions about how he painted the wooden panels on his Death Korps of Krieg artillery piece. Sit back, relax, and learn in the name of the Emperor!

Here's the list of paints and brushes used in this video:

Base
Mournfang Brown

Layer
Deathclaw Brown
Karak Stone
Skrag Brown

Shade
Kroak Green

Technical 
Lahmian Medium

Brushes
Medium Layer
Small Layer
Small Base

If you're new to painting, our Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/

- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: Trench Rot Wood on Krieg Artillery | Warhammer 40,000
